text:
I sometimes crack a lot of jokes and often it's hard to tell when I'm serious:

From the bottom of my heart, I believe Governor Andrew Cuomo committed genocide on the elderly when he ordered nursing homes to accept coronavirus infected patients.

And CNN's propaganda helped him.
